mapper.select: SELECT t.id, t.material_code, m.NAME AS materialName, m.model, d2.dict_value modelName, m.unit, d3.dict_value unitName, t.rebuild_count, t.rebuild_date, t.in_code, t.duty_code, d4.dict_value dutyName, t.machine_code, d5.dict_value as machineName, t.bill_no, t.bill_state , t.create_by, u.user_name AS createByName, t.create_time, t.update_by, u1.user_name AS updateByName, t.update_time, t.remark FROM rebuild_inbound t LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.user_login = t.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user u1 ON u1.user_login = t.update_by LEFT JOIN material_info m ON m.CODE = t.material_code LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data d2 ON d2.dict_code = m.model and d2.dict_type = 'material_model' LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data d3 ON d3.dict_code = m.unit and d3.dict_type = 'material_unit' LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data d4 ON d4.dict_code = t.duty_code and d4.dict_type = 'duty' LEFT JOIN sys_dict_data d5 ON d5.dict_code = t.machine_code and d5.dict_type = 'machine_code' where t.id = #{id}
